item.title: By: Erik Teichmann
item.dc:creator: Erik Teichmann
item.content:encoded:
This works on any widget:


function widget_in_content($atts) {
extract(shortcode_atts(array(
'id' => FALSE
), $atts));

ob_start();
dynamic_sidebar($id);
$sidebar = ob_get_contents();
ob_end_clean();
return $sidebar;

}
add_shortcode('widget_in_content','widget_in_content');
